heading: Module 1
title: Tech Fundamentals and Logical Reasoning
topics: Master Logical Reasoning and First Principles
Learn useful Google & Adobe Tools
Learn & Leverage AI Tools in coding

heading: Module 2
title: Intro to Programming and Data Structures
topics: Learn a programming language like Java/C++
Ace basics of Data Structures
Learn  Recursion and Backtracking

heading: Module 3
title: Advanced Data Structures and Algorithms
topics: Explore Trees, Graphs, & Dynamic Programming
Delve into Searching and Sorting Algorithms
Apply the concepts in a project

heading: Module 4
title: Web Development Essentials and Kickstarting
topics: Learn in-depth Website Development concepts
Master HTML, CSS, and Javascript
Apply the knowledge in a small project

heading: Module 5
title: Frontend Dev with React
topics: Become proficient in React with Express.js
Learn concepts like React Router & state management
Make your personalized portfolio

heading: Module 6
title: Redux and Backend Dev
topics: Learn and integrate React packages like Redux Saga
Know the basics of Internet and API Architecture
Dive into  SQL and NoSQL databases

heading: Module 7
title: Backend Integration + Final Project
topics: Deep-dive into DB indexing, deployment & cyber-security
Learn concepts like caching & authentication
Build and deploy  your First Website

heading: Final Step
title: Job Readiness Prep + Internship/Placement
topics: MOST IMPORTANT - 1:1 mentorship  for job preparation
In-depth resume building  & multiple mock interviews
Gain industry exposure with an  internship
